pages.text:
.entry-header
The Mugs Story
About Us.
In April of 2015, Mugs Sports Bar & Grill opened its doors in Clearwater, Florida. Centrally located in Pinellas County, Mugs Sports Bar & Grill is one of the largest Sports Bars in the Tampa Bay area, spanning almost 16,000 square feet. One of the best features is the outdoor open air patio bar that allows patrons to sit outside enjoying the fresh air, enjoying lunch or dinner and a cold drink. Mugs Sports Bar & Grill keeps 32 cold beers on tap, with many craft beers to choose from. Happy Hour is Monday through Thursday 4 till close and Friday from 4pm to 9pm.
Our Buffalo Style Chicken Wings are the biggest in the business! We cook them properly, locking in the flavor and they are so juicy! Our wings are NEVER frozen, and one bite will tell you all you need to know. You can get them naked (unbreaded) or regular, and you can have them plain or dipped in one of 14 sauces shown in the chart below.
We have a 6,000 square foot multi-purpose room used for events, birthdays, parties, company functions and more. Plus, we offer Karaoke on Mondays and Thursdays from 5-11.
We have a large menu selection, packed with choices like Burgers, Hot Dogs, Steaks, Ribs, Chicken, Burritos and we have a different soup of the day each day of the week.
Our Core Values
Mugs restaurants are dedicated to serving you the freshest, highest quality food and a fair price.  Our dedication to you, our customers, is what keeps our family coming back!  We've been serving our customers since 1988 and look forward to another 30+ years!
Careers
Apply Today
Order.  Pickup.  Take Home.  Enjoy!
Order Online for Pickup
Click here to order all of your Mugs favorites and come by to pick it up.  Curbside service is available - Just ask and we'll happily bring your order out to your vehicle.
Or Call Us : 727-240-1267
.entry-content .clear

Contact Us.
Let us know how we are doing!  Did one of our employees make your visit exceptional?  Let us know.  Something we messed up and need to correct?  Let us know.  Your 100% Satisfaction and a wonderful experience is what the team aims for everyday.  Thanks for visiting us.
